about_the_game:
What you see - is a game that was inspired by a long history of pixel survival games.

We are challenging your expectations! You'll experience: Huge free updates,
an ability to modify your game with the help of convinient tools, new unique mechanics, authentic creatures and event, and of course the rich lore of the Wuilsafe's universe.

Keep in mind, that the game is being developed in such a way, that nothing will interupt you from enjoying the gameplay.


Expand your world.
The game encourages exploration. Expand your world not by gathering piles of useless materials, but by exploring new biomes, blocks, creatures and resources!

Add new fragments to your world, including a variety of biomes into them and experimenting with generation settings.

Keep in mind, that the game has a number of natural phenomenons, which are affecting biomes and mobs differently!


Experiment.
Try to combine different things: creatures and blocks, resources and biomes...

Stress your most ambitious ideas on practice, with a lot of different ways to accomplish your goals!

Special tasks require special blocks that you can create by mixing regular blocks with The Warot.
The Warot - is an infection that tries to mimic the nature. The Warot is mainly thriving in Swamps,
turning them into clusters full of traps. But you can revert the process with the help of moss!

The Warot is not an another "virus that destroyed the world". It's a full-fledged part of the game which will expand your game process by transforming familiar things into something new and not necesserily scary!


Modificate.
You don't need special skills. Convenient in-game tools will let you modificate the game to your liking!

For example, "Free game" is a gamemode that allows you to create your own items, blocks and mobs, by combining and changing settings of already existing content right during the gameplay.


Spend your time doing whatever appeals to you.
The are many ways you can spend your time and express yourself:
- Well-developed building mechanic.
- Interesting structures.
- Lots of resources with their own features.
- Creatures with different characteristics and unique traits.
- Events to diversify your gameplay.
and much more...


Here's the list of already planned updates as a part of "Book One: Heralds of Elements":
Chapter 1 - Release version named as "Preamble".
Chapter 2 - Update of water element, code named as "Water".
Chapter 3 - Update of air element, code named as "Air".
Chapter 4 - Update focused on varying the game process, code named as "Fire".
Chapter 5 - Smithing update, code named as "Metal".
Chapter 6 - Mystical update, code named as "Dark".
Chapter 7 - Closing update of the "Book One", which will add the Heralds of Elements - specific creatures, guardians of the elements, on which stands the whole world


ANSWER TO THE MOST IMPORTANT QUESTION: Yes, we're planning to implement multiplayer into the game :)

Keep up with the new content on our YouTube channel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) X4 840 Quad Core 3.00GHz
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 200 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Wuilsafe is adventure game about exploration. Expand your world, explore a bunch of interesting mechanics. Play comfortably. Play the way you like. Play with blocks.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Swedish, Simplified Chinese
